tests.text: Your new img element should have a src of https://cdn.freecodecamp.org/curriculum/css-cafe/pie.jpg.
Your new img element should have an alt of pie icon.

description: Add one last image under the Desserts heading using the url https://cdn.freecodecamp.org/curriculum/css-cafe/pie.jpg. Give the image an alt value of pie icon.
